summary: Worked in Hyperledger Fabric, Ethereum, R3 Corda. Built chatbots and ML pipelines for face recognition and MLOps workflows.
Researched L2s (OP Stack, StarkEx, Starknet, Besu, Cosmos). Built custodial & non-custodial wallets and Web3 domain systems.
Founding engineer for high-frequency trade engine integrating 8+ CEXs/DEXs. Backend in Rust, frontend with Lit.
Created decentralized network of Llama.cpp servers hosting quantized AI models locally.
Worked with founders on ideation, whitepapers, and AI agent apps. Created AI games, videos, and campaigns.
Producing AI-based short films, ads, tutorials, and music videos.
